name: BacteriaTestsInSputumSpecimenByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Bacteria (Tests in Sputum Specimen by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of bacteria from a sputum specimen by culture),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Bacteria, culture, isolate, sputum),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
